versions.description: This is the blueprint of the metadata block specific for the NRM community
versions.title: NRM Metadata

___collector_name.description: Name of the collector shown on the label.
___collector_name.title: Collector name

___locality.description: Location at which the item shown in the image was collected. This may range from a country name to specific place names and descriptions.
___locality.title: Locality

___uuid.description: The unique identifier for the herbarium sheet shown in this image, typically corresponds to the herbarium sheet's catalogue number shown on the label.
___uuid.title: UUID

___longitude.description: Only modern labels will typically carry coordinates.
___longitude.title: Longitude

___latitude.description: Only modern labels will typically carry coordinates.
___latitude.title: Latitude

___collection_date.description: Collection date shown on the label. This may be incomplete and/or show only year or year/month.
___collection_date.title: Collection date

___species_name.description: Species name displayed on the herbarium sheet label.
___species_name.title: Species name
